1.content: You are in your family living room. You are watching a classic Halloween movie on your couch. Your parents are out with your younger siblings trick or treating. You are so consumed by the movie you cannot make yourself pass out candy. At the climax of the movie you black out to find yourself in the horror movie! What movie were you watching?
1.title: Beginning

14.content:
Waking up you find yourself on a stone ground but upon looking around you notice that the bookcases and tables around were huge!
You think as you look around this place looks very familiar and eventually it hits you you must be in the Frankenstein movie and somehow ended up only about three inches tall. After walking awhile you come across a door which luckily is opened a little allowing you to walk in.

You find yourself in what is the lab from the movie however no one is in here.
You decide to explore the lab since this might be you're only up close chance.

As you walk into the lab....
14.title: Frankenstein

info.brief_description: You are a watching a Halloween classic when you shrink and are surrounded by monsters.
info.description: It is Halloween night and you, a teenager, are watching a classic Halloween movie. You ignore the rings at the doorbell because you are so consumed by the movie. You all of a sudden black out and end up shrunk next to all your favorite monsters.
